Optimise your Chrome browsing with Suspend Unused Tabs, the ultimate extension for enhancing productivity and managing your workspace efficiently. With a focus on simplicity and performance, Suspend Unused Tabs automatically streamlines your browsing by suspending all but your seven most actively used tabs. This not only declutters your browser but also significantly improves your computer's performance by freeing up resources.

Why Choose Suspend Unused Tabs?
* Prioritize Essential Tabs: Keeps your top 7 most-used tabs open, focusing your resources on what matters most.
* Instant Tab Restoration: A dedicated feature to instantly bring back suspended tabs, complete with the option to recover all recently closed tabs.
* Boost Your Browser's Speed: Reduces memory usage and CPU load, leading to a smoother Chrome experience.
* User-Friendly Interface: Designed for ease of use, requiring no manual setup to start optimiÑ–ing your tab management.
* Adapts to Your Needs: Customize settings to fit your browsing habits, including the option to select how many tabs to keep active.
Perfect for professionals, students, and casual users alike, Suspend Unused Tabs transforms your Chrome browser into a more manageable, faster, and resource-efficient tool. Say goodbye to the frustration of excessive tabs and enjoy a cleaner, more focused browsing experience.
Download Suspend Unused Tabs today and take the first step towards a more organized and efficient digital workspace. Streamline your browsing, enhance your productivity, and unlock the full potential of your browser with this must-have Chrome extension.
